name: xmm
description: A Javascript port of the XMM Library
author: Jules Fran√ßoise <me@julesfrancoise.com>

scripts.test: eslint src test benchmark && BABEL_ENV=test ava
scripts.test:coverage: eslint src test && BABEL_ENV=test nyc --all --reporter=html ava --verbose
scripts.doc:api: documentation build src/index.js src/gmm/index.js src/hmm/index.js src/training_set/index.js src/training_set/phrase.js -f html -o docs --sort-order alpha --config documentation.yml --shallow
scripts.doc:dev: documentation build src/** -f html -o docs --sort-order alpha --config documentation-dev.yml
